Ingredients.3: 1 cup cold butter, cut into pieces

Ingredients.12: 2 tablespoons powdered sugar, or to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Line a 9x13-inch pan with parchment paper.

Directions.2: Combine flour, butter, and powdered sugar for crust in a food processor; pulse until fine crumbles form. Press into the prepared pan.

Directions.3: Bake crust in the preheated oven for 15 minutes.

Directions.4: Meanwhile, combine sugar, coconut, flour, eggs, lemon zest, lemon juice, and baking powder in a bowl.

Directions.5: Remove crust from the oven and pour filling over top. Return to the oven and bake until just golden around the edges, 20 to 25 minutes more.

Directions.6: Remove from the oven and let cool, about 30 minutes. Place in the refrigerator until completely chilled, about 2 hours. Dust with powdered sugar and cut into 24 bars.
